article.title: 2026 Team USA Trials, U.S. Amateur set to begin in Las Vegas
article.content: The 2026 USBC Team USA Trials and U.S. National Amateur Bowling Championships are set to take place at the Gold Coast Bowling Center in Las Vegas from January 2 through January 7, 2026. More than 300 of the nation's top bowlers will compete for positions on Team USA and other national honors. Contestants must be at least 18 years old to be eligible for Team USA selection. After competition concludes, Team USA 2026 will be announced and will consist of at least 12 men and 12 women with the top four age-eligible men and women universally securing spots. The trials will test bowlers in various formats and set the stage for an elite roster representing the United States in international play. The U.S. Amateur Championship will run concurrently for bowlers looking to earn national amateur titles. The event not only highlights top talent but also features engaging competition formats to showcase skill and competitive spirit in the sport of bowling.
